Name: Desktop Basketball
About the game: Enjoy basketball with easy to learn controls! Enjoy all kinds of stages! From factories to amusement parks! Customize your team and dunk on your friends! [Practice Game] Experience exciting matches in single player! Play games 3v3 or 5v5. Learn the rules and controls as you go! [Friendly Game] Play competitively or cooperatively with up to 4 people! Play on a normal court or on special courts loaded with fun gimmicks! Use these gimmicks to your advantage to defeat your opponent! [Team Selection] Use items to increase your player's stats or to find your own unique play style! Customize your team's uniforms and make your dream team! [Tournament] Take on the Championship Cup! Battle against strong rivals and seize victory! [Capsule Shoot] Use the points you've gained from playing different modes to get new formations, uniforms, and rare items to take your play to the next level! [Mini Game] Use Point Shooter to rack up points with accurate shooting!
